titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Office of Selective Service and Veterans Affairs, Yale University, Records
Office of Selective Service and Veterans Affairs, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:16

did.unittitle: Office of Selective Service and Veterans Affairs, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of university and local selective service board memoranda; correspondence; book lists; and faculty, staff, and student files documenting the operations of the Yale Office for Selective Service and Veterans Affairs.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office for Selective Service and Veterans Affairs

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 42-B (YRG 42-B), Records of Yale offices responsible for selective service and veterans' affairs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of Selective Service and Veterans Affairs, Yale University, Records (RU 815). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Office of Selective Service and Veterans Affairs was the authorized representative of Yale University in all interactions with the Veterans Administration and the Selective Service. It assisted veterans enrolled at Yale in obtaining educational benefits. It also assisted students register for selective service.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of university and local selective service board memoranda; correspondence; book lists; and faculty, staff, and student files documenting the operations of the Yale Office for Selective Service and Veterans Affairs.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.
